bio.singa.mathematics.algorithms.voronoi.model

Class BeachSection

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.mathematics.graphs.trees.RedBlackNode<BeachSection>
      • bio.singa.mathematics.algorithms.voronoi.model.BeachSection

  • public class BeachSection
extends RedBlackNode<BeachSection>
    The beach section is an implementation of a RedBlackNode. Sorting itself to efficiently store neighbouring beach sections.
